entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 6.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vancouver Int'l Airport 09:00 AM PDT Monday 13 March 2023

Visibility: 24.1 km

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 7.
